-> please/VB (root)
  -> Alessandro/NNP (nsubj)
  -> review/VB (xcomp)
    -> pull-request/NN (dobj)
      -> this/DT (det)
    -> get/VB (advcl)
      -> so/RB (advmod)
      -> that/IN (mark)
      -> we/PRP (nsubj)
      -> can/MD (aux)
      -> it/PRP (dobj)
      -> to/TO (prep)
        -> QA/NNP (pobj)
